statements: SELECT * FROM training_history;
SELECT model_id, training_date FROM training_history WHERE validation_loss > 0;
SELECT model_id, training_accuracy FROM training_history WHERE training_loss < 0;
SELECT training_date, training_loss, validation_loss FROM training_history ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT model_id, training_accuracy FROM training_history WHERE training_accuracy >= 90 ORDER BY training_accuracy DESC, training_date ASC;
SELECT model_id, training_date, training_loss, validation_loss, training_accuracy FROM training_history WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM training_history WHERE training_accuracy >= 90.00 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT model_id, training_accuracy FROM training_history WHERE training_accuracy < 80.00 AND training_loss > 0.5 ORDER BY model_id ASC, training_date ASC;
SELECT training_date, AVG(training_loss) AS avg_training_loss, AVG(validation_loss) AS avg_validation_loss FROM training_history GROUP BY training_date HAVING AVG(training_accuracy) > 85.00;
SELECT model_id, COUNT(*) AS num_trainings FROM training_history GROUP BY model_id HAVING num_trainings > 2 ORDER BY num_trainings DESC, model_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_history;
SELECT id, model_id, accuracy FROM training_history WHERE epoch_count > 10;
SELECT model_id, loss FROM training_history WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY loss DESC;
SELECT * FROM model_progress WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT model_id, start_time, end_time FROM model_progress ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT id, model_id, epoch_count, loss, accuracy FROM training_history WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY epoch_count DESC;
SELECT model_id, status, start_time, end_time FROM model_progress WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT id, model_id, epoch_count, loss, accuracy FROM training_history WHERE loss < 0.05 ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_id, status, start_time, end_time FROM model_progress WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT id, model_id, epoch_count, loss, accuracy FROM training_history WHERE model_id = 3 ORDER BY epoch_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_history;
SELECT model_id, epoch, loss, accuracy FROM training_history WHERE accuracy > 0.9;
SELECT model_id, epoch, accuracy FROM model_progress WHERE epoch = 10;
SELECT * FROM model_config WHERE batch_size = 64 ORDER BY learning_rate DESC;
SELECT model_name, optimizer FROM model_config WHERE num_layers = 5;
SELECT * FROM training_history WHERE accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY epoch DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT model_id, AVG(loss) AS avg_loss FROM training_history GROUP BY model_id HAVING avg_loss < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM model_progress WHERE validation_accuracy > training_accuracy ORDER BY epoch ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, learning_rate, optimizer FROM model_config WHERE batch_size = 64 AND num_layers >= 4;
SELECT model_id, MAX(epoch) AS max_epoch FROM model_progress GROUP BY model_id HAVING max_epoch > 50;
SELECT * FROM training_history ORDER BY epoch DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_name, loss, accuracy FROM training_history WHERE model_name = 'model_A' AND epoch > 10;
SELECT * FROM model_progress WHERE optimizer = 'Adam' ORDER BY epoch ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT model_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE 'learning_rate%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT SUM(loss) AS total_loss, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM training_metrics;
SELECT * FROM training_history ORDER BY epoch DESC, loss ASC
SELECT model_name, AVG(accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM training_history GROUP BY model_name
SELECT progress_id, model_name, current_lr, optimizer FROM model_progress WHERE epoch > 50
SELECT * FROM training_metrics WHERE validation_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY validation_accuracy DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT model_name, AVG(parameter_value) AS avg_parameter_value FROM model_parameters GROUP BY model_name HAVING AVG(parameter_value) > 0.5
SELECT * FROM training_records;
SELECT model_id, training_accuracy, training_loss FROM training_records ORDER BY training_accuracy DESC;
SELECT model_name, architecture FROM model_details WHERE training_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM model_artifacts WHERE artifact_type = 'model_weights';
SELECT model_id, validation_accuracy FROM model_performance ORDER BY validation_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, architecture, hyperparameters FROM model_details WHERE training_status = TRUE;
SELECT model_id, artifact_type, artifact_location FROM model_artifacts JOIN model_details ON model_artifacts.model_id = model_details.model_id;
SELECT validation_accuracy, validation_loss FROM validation_history WHERE validation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT model_id, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM model_performance GROUP BY model_id HAVING avg_metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY avg_metric_value DESC;
